text: Sri Lankabhimanya Dingiri Banda Wijetunga (,; 15 February 1916 â€“ 21 September 2008) was the fourth President of Sri Lanka from 1 May 1993 to 12 November 1994, Prime Minister of Sri Lanka from 3 March 1989 to 7 May 1993 and the Governor of North Western province, Sri Lanka from 1988 to 1989. He was awarded Sri Lanka's most highest award to a civilian Sri Lankabhimanya in 1993 by President Ranasinghe Premadasa Category:1916 births Category:2008 deaths Category:Prime Ministers of Sri Lanka Category:Presidents of Sri Lanka
title: Dingiri Wijetunga
